Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2024
Author: JeanineJeanine
Title: I would have rated it 0 if could
Body: I spent 54 USD to send it to Italy, (taxes and shipping incl.) because I liked the brand mainly for the life warranty. I was expecting at least a bare minimum protection, but they just put the product inside the Amazon package which was neither the box, so it has arrived in Italy damaged and DIRTY. I am very disappointed, also because I had to pay extra, and this is what I received. At least other costumers had an extra plastic bag. I did have nothing.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2024
Author: Anoynomous
Title: Keeps water cold for hours
Body: This is currently one of my favorite 16 oz cups I'm drinking out of daily, its easy to wash, and the performance and insulation of this cup is top knotch quality. On a scorching hot day with heatwaves on a summer day. Luckily my water stayed cold for hours. Unfortunately I did not have the luxury of  air conditioning  so this cup helped keep me cool and hydrated after I thawed it from the freezer. I most recently saw an advertising from Stanley cup on Instagram seeking to find scouts to help promote their Stanley cup and I would absolutely love to team up with Amazon and or Stanley to help promote some of thier things. I would love even some freebies to promote. Although there are plenty of knock off Stanley cups  everywhere, in my personal opinion I have to say the Stanley brand name cup was worth the price!

Title: Cosmetic damage

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2024
Author: JzHolmes
Title: Ok Product
Body: I recently bought the Stanley Quencher H2.0 FlowState Tumbler, and while I love the design and insulation, I have to give it 3 stars because it leaks. The stainless steel construction and the included lid and straw are great, and it keeps drinks hot or cold as promised. However, the leaking issue is a significant drawback and makes it less practical for everyday use. If youâ€™re looking for a tumbler with reliable leak-proof performance, you might want to consider other options.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2024
Author: Rachael Hanson
Title: Perfect for iced coffee
Body: Perfect for my serving of iced coffee everyday. However it took 3 times to get one that was the right size and wasn't damaged. Otherwise cute and works!
